item.title: Python Is Cool
item.description: This is some basic python code showing how the language can be used in data science. Our example will be a reading of Great Expectations by Thomas Paine! Lets start by loading in the book. The textfile “CommonSense.txt” contains all the information. We will also load in some necessary packages. import re import collections import operator #array for all words wordList=[] #read novel into lines novel = open("CommonSense.txt") lines = novel.
